- kobo-install changes:

  - Unsafe characters for passwords are not supported anymore

- Use release `2.022.16` of kobo-docker

    - KPI: `2.022.16`
    - KoBoCAT: `2.022.16`
    - Enketo-Express: `3.1.0`

     For more information, please see https://community.kobotoolbox.org/t/release-notes-version-2-022-16-2-022-16a-2-022-16b/29420

- Bump version to `6.6.0`
  
  - Bump version of NGINX HTTPS proxy to `1.21`
  - Use docker network for traffic between HTTPS proxy and `kobo-docker` containers

name: 2.021.41a
body:
Use release `2.021.41a` of kobo-docker

KPI: `2.021.41`
KoBoCAT: `2.021.41`
Enketo-Express: `2.8.1`

Bump version to `6.2.0`

- Use `2.021.41` release of kobo-docker. 
- Users can persist their own settings within another compose YML file
- Maximum memory usage can be customized (only for the Redis cache container)
- Redis containers can be started from secondary back-end server
- `--update` option updates the tip of the current branch if no arguments are
specified
- Bugfixes:
    1. Cannot start kobo-install with Python 3.5.
    2. Containers were always rebuilt in dev mode when running setup

name: 2.020.52b
body: For more information, please see https://community.kobotoolbox.org/t/release-notes-version-2-020-52b/14549

- Version `4.4.1`
- Added support to virtual ip addresses on macOS
- Fixed configuration not upgraded with `--auto-update`
- Warning message for exposed port only appear for single or back-end only server

name: 2.020.49-pre
body:
- Use release 2.020.49-pre of kobo-docker
    - KPI: `2.020.30-hotfix-2450`
    - KoBoCAT: `2.020.49-pre`
    - Enketo-Express: `2.3.10`

- Version `4.2.0`
- Dropped Python 2 support
- Validate AWS credentials when using S3

- Version `4.0.0`
- Code refactoring for better readability
   - PEP-8 rules compliance
   - Development team coding style compliance
- Improved colors contrast on macOS terminal

- Version `3.4.0`
- Add WAL-E support on primary back-end server (with AWS storage only)
- Use release `2.020.45` of kobo-docker
   - KPI: `2.020.30-hotfix-2450`
   - KoBoCAT: `2.020.44`
   - Enketo-Express: `2.3.10`

- Use release `2.020.44` of kobo-docker
  - KPI: `2.020.30-hotfix-2450`

body:
- Use release `2.020.40b` of kobo-docker

  - KoBoCAT: `2.020.40a`
  - Enketo-Express: `2.3.10`

- Use release `2.020.39` of kobo-docker
  - KPI: `2.020.30-hotfix-2450`
  - KoBoCAT: `2.020.39`
  - Enketo-Express: `2.3.10`

- Version `3.2.1`
- Add support to secondary back-end server
- Add Python 3.8 in tox environments
- Use release `2.020.37` of kobo-docker
   - KPI: `2.020.30-hotfix-2450`
   - KoBoCAT: `2.020.31`
   - Enketo-Express: `2.3.10`

- Use release `2.020.30` of kobo-docker
    - KPI: `2.020.30`
    - KoBoCAT: `2.020.31`
    - Enketo-Express: `2.3.5`

- Use release 2.020.30 of kobo-docker:
    - KPI: 2.020.30
    - KoBoCAT: 2.020.30
    - Enketo-Express: 2.3.5

- Version 3.1.3
- Use release 2.020.28a of kobo-docker
- Fixed: Auto update hangs when environment files in kobo-env are already present

- Version 3.1.2
- Create override YML files for kobo-docker with new terminology `Primary/Secondary` for backend containers
- Create environment files within `kobo-env` folder instead `kobo-deployment`. `kobo-deployment` is renamed on upgrade (after running setup).
- Fixed broken update mechanism (`./run.py --update` was needed to be run twice to update properly)
- Allow to update to a different branch or tag
- Update to `stable` branch by default
- Updated README
See https://github.com/kobotoolbox/kpi/releases/tag/2.020.25 for more information.

name: 2.020.24b
body:
- Version 2.4.2
- Use release 2.020.24b of kobo-docker
- Added possibility to customize uWSGI timeouts (`uwsgi.ini` and `nginx.conf`)
- Fixed reverse proxy option value not retained
- Allow empty redis password

name: 2.019.52.final-shared-database
body: This is the last release to support KPI and KoBoCAT sharing the same Postgres database.
